welcomeBack: Welcome back, here is an overview of your workspace.
quickActionsDesc: Jump right into your creative process for {grade}.
studentProgressDesc: Monthly overview of class engagement and performance for {grade}.
upcomingLessonsDesc: Here's what's on your schedule for today.
aiCurriculumGuideDesc: Let our AI assistant craft a curriculum outline for your {grade} workspace.
defineCurriculumDesc: Fill in the details below for your {grade} workspace.
subject: Subject
generatedCurriculumDesc: Your AI-generated curriculum will appear here.
formPrompt: Please fill out the form to generate a curriculum.
aiContentGeneratorDesc: Generate lesson plans, quizzes, and more for your {grade} students. Select a content type and provide the details.
contentDetailsDesc: Specify what you need for your {grade} workspace.
learningObjectivePlaceholder: e.g., Students will be able to explain the process of photosynthesis.
generatedContentDesc: Your AI-generated content will appear here.
contentFormPrompt: Please fill out the form to generate content.
knowledgeBaseDesc: Manage your teaching materials. The AI will use these files to provide more context-aware assistance.
uploadNewMaterialDesc: Add PDF documents or video files to your knowledge base.
dragAndDrop: or drag and drop them here
uploadedMaterialsDesc: Here are the materials you have uploaded.
emptyKnowledgeBase: Your knowledge base is empty. Upload some files to get started!
fileUploadedDesc: {fileName} has been added to your knowledge base.
fileDeletedDesc: {fileName} has been removed from your knowledge base.
summarizerDesc: Paste any text below to get a concise summary, perfect for lesson planning. You can even listen to it!
enterDocumentDesc: Paste the content you want to summarize.
generatedSummaryDesc: Your AI-generated summary will appear here.
summaryDisplayPrompt: Your summary will be displayed here.
summaryDisplaySubPrompt: Simply paste your text in the box on the left and click 'Summarize Document'.
whiteboardDesc: Your interactive space for lessons and creativity. Draw, write, and collaborate in real-time.
micErrorDesc: Please allow microphone access in your browser settings.
manageSubjectsDesc: Add or remove subjects for this grade.
manageGradesDesc: Add or remove grades from the list.
plannerDesc: Organize your schedule, plan lessons, and manage your time effectively.
title: Title
